page.title: 08STUART PETHICK'S DAY (1)
page.content: {Stuart lives at l6 Morwellham Cottages {with his parents and younger brother. {He is 7 years old and goes to {Gulworthy County Primary School where {he is in the Infant Class. } 7.00 First thing in the morning got up and dressed.Then he had toast for breakfast. 8.25 He catches the school bus. 8.40 He arrives at school.As soon as he gets to school he gets the menu for the school dinners.Then he goes out to play. 8.50 He comes in and plays word matching games.They go to assembly. Then they tell Mrs. Swanson their news and do language work. 10.30 He goes out to play. 11.00 Maths work or learning games. 12.00 School lunch (57p).He had lamb,potatoes,cabbage,fresh fruit and an orange drink.(Continued on p9)
